interpretation: The Turkey card is a symbol of abundance, gratitude, and nourishment. It represents the bountiful harvest that comes from hard work and dedication. This card reminds us to be thankful for the blessings in our lives and to share our abundance with others. It also encourages us to take care of ourselves and nourish our bodies and souls. The Turkey card can indicate a time of plenty and prosperity, but it can also suggest the need to be mindful of our consumption and avoid overindulgence. Overall, this card is a reminder to appreciate the abundance in our lives and to give back to those around us.
